name: Pix11_11_21
description: Pix11_11_21 is part of a series of 6 experimental digital glitch artworks dated back to 2013/2014 circa when thanks to the use of a technique called "progressive scan" I was researching the behavior of pixels in the transmission of an image over audio from a device to another, transmitter and receiver. What you see here is a gif converted into sound and sent to another device to become a gif again. I love to see these pixels get wild and free!
